text: Patrick Finnegan (September 20, 1949 â€“ July 2, 2018) was a United States Army Brigadier General. He served as president of Longwood University from 2010 to 2012. Finnegan served 39 years in the U.S. Army, retiring in 2010 after serving as the 12th Dean of the Academic Board at the U.S. Military Academy. He was born in Fukuoka, Japan, but raised in Baltimore, Maryland. Finnegan died in Farmville, Virginia on July 2, 2018 from a heart attack, aged 68. ==References== ==Other websites== *Patrick Finnegan's Facebook page Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American generals Category:Educators from Baltimore Category:Lawyers from Baltimore Category:Military people from Maryland
title: Patrick Finnegan
